headline: AbbVie Secures FDA Approval to Expand Mavyret’s Label
summary: AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) is one of the best stocks for a dividend stock portfolio. The company announced that the US FDA has expanded the approved use of its oral antiviral drug Mavyret, developed in partnership with Enanta Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENTA), for treating Hepatitis C. The updated approval allows Mavyret—made from the antiviral agents glecaprevir and […]

headline: FDA approves label expansion of AbbVie hepatitis C therapy
summary: The decision is based on data from a Phase III, single-arm, prospective multicentre trial.
